versions.summary: First public, production-ready release of VERAX
highlights: Vision 1.0 fully implemented and externally audited
Deterministic silent failure detection for public pre-auth flows
Evidence-backed findings with screenshots and DOM diffs
LIMITED mode safety guarantee (always INCOMPLETE when source missing)
Doctor command hardened for clean installs
Zero false positives verified across 859 tests
knownLimitations: Post-authentication flows are out of scope (always INCOMPLETE)
Visual-only feedback (CSS animations, spinners) not detected
Dynamic routes requiring backend state are not analyzed
versions.notes: This release is implementation-honest, vision-compliant, and approved for public distribution.
